IsiPython is a beginner-friendly program: IsiPython liqonga elinobuhlobo nabantu abaqalayo elifundisa iingcamango zokukhouda ngolwimi lwakho lwemvelo, okwenza ukuprogram kufinyeleleke kuye wonke umntu nokuba akakho mgxagxo kangakanani kwisingesi.
Breaking down language barriers in progr: Sidiliza imiqobo yolwimi kwimfundo yokuprograma thina singuIsiPython
IsiPython was created by local students: U-IsiPython wadalwa ngabafundi bendawo abaqonda imingeni yokufunda ukuprograma ngolwimi lwesibini. Iqonga lethu livala umsantsa phakathi kwemfundo yeprogramu yesiko nokuqonda kwenkcubeko.
Many students struggle with programming: Abafundi abaninzi bayasokola ngeprogramu kuba kufuneka baqale bakwazi isingesi phambi kokuba baqonde iingcamango zekhowudi. I-IsiPython isusa lo mqobo ngokufundisa iingcamango zokuprograma ngolwimi lwakho lwemvelo kuqala.
Our interactive platform encourages hand: Iqonga lethu elinxibelelwano likhuthaza ukufunda ngesandla. Bhala ikhowudi, ubone iziphumo ngoko nangoko, kwaye wakhe ukuzithemba ngokuzama okusebenzayo kwindawo yolwimi eyaziwayo.
Build and Run IsiXhosa Code Online: Yakha kwaye uSebenzise iKhowudi yesiXhosa Kwi-intanethi
Write, compile, and execute IsiXhosa-bas: Bhala, udibanise, kwaye usebenzise ikhowudi yePython esekelwe kwisiXhosa ngqo kwibrawuza yakho. Akukho kufakwa kufunekayo - qala nje ukukhouda kwaye ubone iziphumo ngoko nangoko.
Access our extensive library of tutorial: Fikelela kwithala lethu elibanzi lezikhokelo, amaxwebhu, kunye nezixhobo zoluntu. Nokuba ungumqali ogqibeleleyo okanye ujonge ukuphakamisa izakhono zakho, sinezixhobo eziyilelwe ngokukodwa abathi siXhosa abafunda iingcamango zokuprograma.
Start your programming journey today wit: Qala uhambo lwakho lokuprograma namhlanje ngeqonga lethu elinobuhlobo nabantu abaqalayo eliyilelwe ngokukodwa abathi siXhosa. Joyina amawaka abafundi abafunda ukukhouda ngolwimi lwabo lwemvelo.
Learn coding fundamentals through intera: Funda iziseko zokukhowda ngokusebenzisa imisebenzi yokusebenzisana eyenzelwe ngokukodwa abathetha isiXhosa
Join thousands of students learning prog: Joyina amawaka abafundi abafunda ukuprograma ngolwimi lwabo lwemvelo. Diliza imiqobo yolwimi kwaye wakhe ikamva lakho kwezobuchwepheshe.
Learn programming concepts in your nativ: Funda iingcamango zokuprograma ngolwimi lwakho lwemvelo
Access to interactive coding exercises a: Fikelela kwimisebenzi yokukhouda enxibelelwano kunye neeprojekthi
Free access to all learning materials an: Ukufikelela simahla kuzo zonke izixhobo zokufunda nezixhobo
Sign in to access your personalized lear: Ngena ukuze ufikelele kwi-dashboard yakho yokufunda eyenziwe ngokukodwa, ulandelele inkqubela yakho, kwaye uqhubekeke nokukhohlakala iPython ngolwimi lwakho lwemvelo.
